review: Awesome product. We won a flat screen tv in a raffle at a super bowl party. But it was not a smart tv and we don't use cable or satellite... So to use it, we really need it to be Wi-Fi capable. This solved our problem and exceeded expectations! Now we have Netflix and Amazon on the tv and a bunch of other channels like PBS, news channels, and more. You can even pick up a subscription to watch NBA games. It runs a bit slow, so expect to wait 10 seconds when navigating the menus, especially when you first turn it on each day. But for the price and the ability to get all our programs it's a great product!
